sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() // this is an static data later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options = {day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric"} return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? "Not rated" : (({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price} / per person {distance} km {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/* tour reviews section */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review => (
minnnn

{new Date('01-01-2024').toLocaleDateString("en-US", options)}

5
Amazing tour
)) }
) } export default TourDetails
